title: Leaver Buster Warning! (couldn't connect to server?)
body:
I just got the 'could not connect to the server', with links to the support.riotgames.com website. My internet connection was working while this happened as I was on skype. I managed to re-log in 17 minutes after my game had started.

I later tried launching the client and got a different error;"RADS ERROR" which occurred after the first issue was resolved.

**Now after launching the client I get a Leaver Buster message, saying I have to agree to not leaving any further games .. (from the initial 17m 'afk') doesn't seem fair that i get a leaver buster warning for problems outside my direct control?**

replies.body:
Some people are currently experiencing the same problem, it may not be an issue on your end. Wait it out a bit and keep an eye on the boards.

Haven't seen any reds reporting in but they surely can't let it go so far.
